definition: A large organized group of individuals, typically trained and equipped for warfare, often under the command of a higher-ranking officer. It is commonly used to refer to a military force or army.

examples.german: Die Armee marschierte in die Stadt ein.
examples.english: The army marched into the city.

examples.german: Die Armee wurde f√ºr ihren Mut gelobt.
examples.english: The army was praised for their bravery.

examples.german: Die Armee besteht aus tausenden Soldaten.
examples.english: The army consists of thousands of soldiers.

examples.german: Die Armee wurde in den Krieg geschickt.
examples.english: The army was sent to war.

examples.german: Die Armee hat den Feind besiegt.
